Reviews.Title: OK if your cheap
Reviews.Author: mdrcoast
Reviews.Content: This system is easy to set up, just mount the camera and install the software.  Just be sure you install it on a 32 bit OS as there are no 64 bit drivers for the DVR.  I ended up pulling an old laptop and loading the software on it.  I have had to re-install the software a few times, not sure if it is the Laptop or DVR software causing the issue but since it is running on a low end laptop I wont take away points for that.If you want to run it with an external hard drive, make sure you have USB 2.0 or better as I have found that using USB 1.0 just isn't fast enough and it corrupts the files on the external drive.Images are surprisingly clear.Wireless makes for easy installation. Not running a bunch of cables is a plus. The software can be a little buggy and there is little or no customer support.If you are looking for a professional system, this is NOT for you but if you just want to watch the driveway, it will work.

ProductInfo.Features:
SM-302TX camera transmits up to 100 ft without any interference from 2.4 GHz/5.8 GHz devices
